name: Hondahitha - The Curd Shop
description: Hondahitha is name synonymous with great curd around the Colombo suburbs. This is their little cafe in Kohuwala which has some great waffles for cheap.
tip: They have really good treacle and honey.
review:
If you say “Hondahitha” to a Sri Lankan the first thing that they will be reminded of is “Dosthara Hondahitha”, but around Nugegoda it’s also the name of a very popular brand of curd
